resources.string:
Trick explained 
 1/2 

 Give the phone to the viewer and let him chose a word. If he wants he can shuffle as much as he wants

Trick explained 
 2/2 

 Ask the viewer to read all the words out loud. You will be able to guess the word he chose

The secret 
 1/5 

 Each word is divided into two categories: straight words and curved words

The secret 
 2/5 

 Straight words are words whose first letter can be drawn using only straight lines

The secret 
 3/5 

 Curved words are words whose first letter contains at least one curved line

The secret 
 4/5 

 Note that each letter has to be considered as UPPERCASE in a standard font

The secret 
 5/5 

 The word chosen by the user is the only one in the list of its category

Example 
 1/2 

 Words in the straight line category are Tokyo, Manila, Instambul...

Example 
 2/2 

 Words in the curved line category are Beijing, Rome, Calcutta...
Straight letters \n A, E, F, H, I, K, L, M, N, T, V, W, X, Y, Z
Curved letters \n B, C, D, G, J, O, P, Q, R, S, U
